## Regular

```{r}
#| echo: false
data.frame(
    img = '<img src="../../dynamic/img/mon/mummy.png" height=64>',
    name = '<a href="../../dynamic/html/mon/mummy.html">Mummy</a>',
    hitpoints = 100,
    experience = 100
) |>
    DT::datatable(
        rownames = FALSE,
        escape = FALSE,
        colnames = c("", "Name", "Hitpoints", "Experience"),
        options = list(pageLength = 50, autoWidth = TRUE)
    )
```
